name: Implosion (itch)
description:
A black hole powerplant has gone awry. Use your cunning to control droids and get all the volatile power cells off the planet so they can explode at a safe distance.

How to play:

-to move your character just click on it then click on an adjacent tile. 

-when moving one droid all droids on lower layers will make the same move.

Tiles:

Bridge:

the bridge can only be moved upon if you initiate the movement from a different layer

Laser Grid:

This kills you

Gate:

you'll need a key to get past it
